trans-unit.source: Wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks, either for requests from client to server or for the subsequent responses.
trans-unit.target: 包装在消息接收器之间传递的远程处理数据，或者用于从客户端到服务器的请求，或者用于后续的响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is the base class for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes, which wrap messages for method calls on remote objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>类是适用于基<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>类，该类将消息包装为远程对象上调用方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> is used by the infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> 使用.NET Framework 的基础结构。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create instances of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的实例<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>， <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>，和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>直接类。

trans-unit.source: A message that acts either as an outgoing method call on a remote object, or as the subsequent response.
trans-unit.target: 一条消息，或者作为远程对象上的输出方法调用，或者作为后续的响应。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>类使用的.NET framework 远程处理基础结构。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> directly.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> parameter also implements the derived interface, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, which indicates that the message acts as a request or as a response on a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>参数还实现的派生的接口<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>，指示消息充当请求或远程方法调用的响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interfaces, in turn, inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interface.
Represents the request or response <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage" /> interface that is wrapped by the message wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 表示由消息包装所包装的请求或响应 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage" /> 接口。
